subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: The freshman Corey Stokes scored 13 points Saturday night, when Villanova jumped to an early lead and never lost it in a 60-42 victory over St. John’s at Madison Square Garden.
snippet: The freshman Corey Stokes scored 13 points Saturday night, when Villanova jumped to an early lead and never lost it in a 60-42 victory over St. John’s at Madison Square Garden.
